answers.answer: Due Christmas,But Already Havinq Contractions, Lost Plug, And Cervix Is Soft..Dr Gives Me Till End Of Month.I'm So Excited I Can't Wait ! But I Do Hope She's Healthy And Everything's Good (;
I'm due dec 16th and haven't done a thing  yet

Due December 15th, done with nursery and bought everything my baby will need..but we are still refurbishing the rest of the house and waiting for the new living room to come...scared, excited and a little overwhelmed..

Technically due 26 Dec but csection booked for 28 Nov if we make it that far. Everything is all set, nothing left to buy, even started our Christmas shopping last night so I'm not stressing about that!
Due December 4th I'm sooooo ready can't wait.hoping for mid November tho my oldest child is Dec 14th two bdays in December and Christmas smh lol

I'm due Dec 22nd. Every one thinks because of my small frame I won't go full term. Getting very restless but I have everything already ready. Just a few more things for my hospital bag. My doctor hasn't checked me or anything she just listens to the heart beat abd measures so far so who knows!! All I know is at 24 weeks when I got a 3d ultrasound he was the size of a 28 week baby! !
I'm due Dec 1st drs didn't think I'd make it to 36 weeks here I am now admitted at 36/3 and being induced Monday November 10th due to preeclampsia :/  I proved them wrong n made it to 36 weeks tho
Congrsts dec mommies due dec 19 nursery is finished other than my mom is going to hang the shelves and a few pictures for us :-) might be having a repeat cesarean dec 12 though.

title: December Mommies
